snippet: A gallant Milos Raonic was left heartbroken by his Australian Open semi-final loss to Andy Murray on Friday, having pushed the Scot to his limits before a leg injury took the game out of his hands....
lead_paragraph: A gallant Milos Raonic was left heartbroken by his Australian Open semi-final loss to Andy Murray on Friday, having pushed the Scot to his limits before a leg injury took the game out of his hands.

headline.print_headline: Raonic Rueful After Leg Injury Ends Semi-Final Hopes
headline.main: Raonic Rueful After Leg Injury Ends Semi-Final Hopes
